tutorial.title: Golestoon Tutorial
tutorial.welcome_text:
Welcome to Golestoon! This application helps you easily manage your weekly class schedule and grade status.

In this tutorial, you will learn about all the features of the application. Our goal is for you to be able to use the application easily and have an enjoyable experience.

The application has various features that help you better manage your courses.
tutorial.interface_text:
The application interface is divided into three main sections, each with its specific function:

  • Right Section: Course list and main operations including add, edit, and delete courses
  • Center Section: Weekly schedule table where you place your courses
  • Left Section: Information, statistics, and advanced tools such as search and filter

Each section is fully customizable and you can change their size by dragging the separators. This flexibility allows you to create your ideal workspace.

The menu bar at the top provides all the application features. These include saving and restoring schedules, printing tables, and advanced tools.
tutorial.add_course_text:
You can add courses using two different methods:

Method 1: Manual Addition

  1. Click the "‚ûï Add Course" button
  2. Enter course information (name, code, instructor, time)
  3. Click "Save"

Method 2: Automatic Fetch from Golestan

From the "Data" menu, select "Auto Fetch from Golestan" to automatically fetch courses from the Golestan system.

Important Notes:

  • Course times must be entered in standard format (e.g., 08:00-10:00)
  • You can enter multiple times for one course (e.g., class + exercise session)
  • Each course color is automatically assigned
  • You can enter additional information such as class location, capacity, and description
tutorial.manage_courses_text:
Course management is one of the most important parts of the application, allowing you to easily organize your courses:

Search and Filter

  • Search: Use the search box at the top of the course list
  • Filter: Use the dropdown menu to filter by major

Edit and Delete

  • Edit: Double-click on the course or use the context menu
  • Delete: Select the course and choose delete from the context menu
tutorial.schedule_text:
The schedule table is the heart of the application where you place your courses:

Adding Courses to the Table

  • Method: Double-click on the course in the left list

Viewing Details

  • View Details: Hover your mouse over the course in the table
  • Time Conflict: Courses that conflict with each other are shown in red

Managing Courses in the Table

  • Delete: Click the "‚úï" button in the corner of the course

Important Notes:

  • Use the Tools menu to print or save the schedule
  • Use automatic scheduling to select the best course combination
tutorial.golestan_text:
The application can automatically fetch course information and your details from the Golestan system:

Fetching Your Profile

  • From the "Data" menu, select "Student Profile"
  • Enter your student number and password
  • Your information will be automatically fetched

Fetching Course Information

  • From the "Data" menu, select "Auto Fetch from Golestan"
  • Course information will be automatically fetched
  • Information includes course name, instructor, time, and class location

Benefits of This Method:

  • Time saving
  • More accuracy in entering information
  • Synchronization with the latest system changes
  • Your password is securely stored
tutorial.database_text:
The application securely stores all your information:

Automatic Saving

  • All information is automatically saved
  • No need for manual saving
  • Information is preserved even if the computer shuts down

Quick Search

  • Quickly find courses by name or instructor
  • Filter by faculty or major
  • Sort results by course name or code

Benefits of Data Storage:

  • Quick access to course information in the future
  • Ability to restore previous schedules
  • Synchronization with latest course changes
  • Protection of your important information
tutorial.student_profile_text:
The application provides the ability to manage your personal and academic information:

Personal Information

  • Contact information and student number
  • Faculty, major, and academic level
  • Profile photo and additional information

Academic Records

  • Managing academic semesters
  • Recording courses and grades for each semester
  • Calculating semester and overall GPA
  • Displaying academic statistics
tutorial.exam_schedule_text:
The application provides the ability to manage and display exam schedules:

Displaying Exam Schedule

  • Automatic display of exam schedule based on selected courses
  • Display exact date and time of each course exam
  • Display exam location

Advanced Features

  • Export schedule as PDF (portrait and landscape)
  • Export schedule as HTML
  • Detect exam time conflicts
  • Display remaining days until exam

Benefits of This Section:

  • Better preparation for exams
  • Easy printing and sharing of schedule
  • Alerts for upcoming exams
  • Better study time management
tutorial.backup_text:
The application has a strong security system to protect your information:

Automatic Backup

  • Automatic backup file creation when exiting the application
  • Keeping the last 5 backup files
  • Complete save of schedule table state

Usage History

  • Display 5 recent backups in the "Usage History" menu
  • Display date and time
  • Ability to restore any backup with one click
  • Complete replacement of current table with selected backup

Benefits of Data Security:

  • Preventing data loss
  • Easy access to previous versions
  • Protection of your work hours
  • Peace of mind when using the application
tutorial.finish_text:
Congratulations! You have fully learned about all the features of the application.

To access this tutorial again, select "Tutorial" from the "Help" menu or press the F1 key.

Additional Tips:

  • To view the exam schedule, use the dedicated button at the bottom of the page
  • For automatic schedule generation, use the "Courses Selected for Automatic Scheduling" section
  • For program backup, use the Tools menu

Good luck!
tutorial.skip_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to skip the tutorial?
